reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I enjoy all Sol de Janeiro items, I mainly purchase their body sprays or these Jet Set bags. Cheirosa '40 & '59 are my favorite scents and are worth testing out if you're new to the brand. Sol de Janeiro products are pretty pricey compared to affordable body care items (e.g., Bath & Body Works or drug store options), but this travel bag allows you to test out all the items before shelling out the cost for the full-sized items. All 3 products can be layered and help lengthen the body spray's longevity. Although I have sensitive skin, I haven't had an issue with the fragrance being too overpowering or irritating my skin.  I would love for Sol de Janeiro to come out with this Cheirosa '40 scent in an actual perfume vs just the body spray and really hope they don't ever discontinue this line. The scent is very fruity, but the warm vanilla notes is what makes it so good. I have a ton of perfumes to choose from every day but I have been picking up this body spray constantly instead. I receive the most compliments when I wear this scent and although it's a body spray, it has great projection. The plastic zip-up bag is a little small to be reused as a makeup bag; however, because it's clear, it can be used for TSA liquid items or as a emergency bag for your purse/car. The body cream that comes in this set is much larger than the deluxe rewards I have gotten and lasts a few weeks. The body wash and spray bottle are on the small side; however, they do last a few weeks also. Highly recommend picking this set up!
